Blackstorm:

"Are you telling me that I... I wasn't all my life a Pred?"said 
Blackstorm with fear



--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Rudra656@a... wrote:
> ::Hevn::
>        He sighs and shakes his head.  "Dear Blackheart.  How naive 
you are.  
> I was once considered a Maximal, though I suppose you don't know 
that, as 
> were you."  He shrugs and shakes his head again.  "But that was 
the past.  
> This is the present.  If you are happy here then here is where I 
shall stay."
